name: Snowbots
overview: In this Christmas themed shooter, you play the role of Jolly old Saint Nick himself as he battles hordes of evil robot snowmen as they try to destroy Christmas. It's up to you to save Christmas and the world. Good luck. Released in the following: French magazine Micro V.O No.12 (November 1986) Euro-wide magazine Your Computer 1986/01 Your Computer #4 (a Spanish compilation pack) (called Snowbot on the box) The only main differences between the Spanish and English versions is the text on the title screen is in different languages, the gameplay screenshots for both regions are in English. However, the French version has French text on the top of the screen in the in-game screenshots.
